TheSimpletonMod:AbundanceKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Increases the number of #yCrop stacks #yPlanted by cards.

TheSimpletonMod:ArtichokeKeyword.DESCRIPTION: #yCrop. Grants Thorns when harvested. NL (Matures at #b2 stacks)

TheSimpletonMod:AsparagusKeyword.DESCRIPTION: #yCrop. Grants Dexterity when harvested. NL (Matures at #b3 stacks)

TheSimpletonMod:BurningKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Burning creatures take damage at the end of their turn, then lose Burning.

TheSimpletonMod:ChilisKeyword.DESCRIPTION: #yCrop. Deals damage and applies #yBurning to all enemies when harvested. NL (Matures at #b5 stacks)

TheSimpletonMod:CornKeyword.DESCRIPTION: #yCrop. Draw cards when harvested. NL (Matures at #b2 stacks)

TheSimpletonMod:DepletionKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Depletions are playable status cards that reduce your Energy and Draw next turn.

TheSimpletonMod:GnawberryKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Gnawberries are attack cards that deal moderate damage and heal HP.

TheSimpletonMod:HuskKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Husks #b0-cost skill cards that exhaust to grant a small amount of Block.

TheSimpletonMod:MaturityKeyword.DESCRIPTION: A #yCrop is mature if you have stacks equal to its maturity level. One stack of each mature crop is #gHarvested at the start of your turn.

TheSimpletonMod:MushroomKeyword.DESCRIPTION: #yCrop. Gain random colorless cards when harvested. NL (Matures at #b2 stacks)

TheSimpletonMod:OnionKeyword.DESCRIPTION: #yCrop. Applies Weak to a random enemy when harvested. NL (Matures at #b5 stacks)

TheSimpletonMod:Numbed.DESCRIPTION: Temporarily increases the cost of a random card in hand when a card is played.

TheSimpletonMod:PotatoKeyword.DESCRIPTION: #yCrop. Yields 0-cost Spud attack cards when harvested. NL (Matures at #b5 stacks)

TheSimpletonMod:PlotKeyword.DESCRIPTION: A slot for planting Crops. NL NL Your Plots determine how many different Crops you can have planted at one time.

TheSimpletonMod:SpinachKeyword.DESCRIPTION: #yCrop. Grants Strength when harvested. NL (Matures at #b2 stacks)

TheSimpletonMod:SpudKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Spuds are 0-cost attack cards that exhaust to deal modest damage.

TheSimpletonMod:SquashKeyword.DESCRIPTION: #yCrop. Grants #yBlock When harvested. NL (Matures at #b5 stacks)

TheSimpletonMod:StrawberryKeyword.DESCRIPTION: #yCrop. Yields Gnawberry attack cards when harvested that also heal a small amount of HP. NL (Matures at #b3 stacks)

TheSimpletonMod:SunflowerKeyword.DESCRIPTION: #yCrop. Gain energy when harvested. NL (Matures at #b2 stacks)

TheSimpletonMod:TurnipKeyword.DESCRIPTION: #yCrop. Yields an attack card when harvested which deals scaling damage to all enemies and adds a Turnips card to your discard pile. NL (Matures at #b3 stacks)
